zh.title: 微软CSS
zh.position: Azure Entra ID Tech Support Engineer
desc: 负责Azure Entra ID产品验证范围内的技术支持工作。所涉及领域包括账户、设备管理、条件访问、身份保护及企业应用集成与部署，同时支持本地联合验证服务（如ADFS）。此外，支持Graph API与PowerShell Graph Module的功能指引与报错排查，以及身份平台验证代码集成的实现，熟悉OAuth2.0、OIDC及SAML等主流验证协议。
在日常支持过程中，针对用户提出的问题，需通过收集必要的诊断信息、分析现象找到根本原因，并根据用户实际需求提供最合适的解决方案，确保系统稳定运行。
实现了对Entra ID验证业务问题的及时定位与高效解决。通过准确的问题诊断与针对性支持，确保了平台的稳定性并提高了客户满意度。

en.title: Microsoft CSS
en.position: Azure Entra ID Tech Support Engineer
desc: Responsible for technical support within the scope of Azure Entra ID product authentication. Expertise includes Account/Device Management, Conditional Access, Identity Protection, and Enterprise Application integration/deployment, alongside supporting on-premises federation services (ADFS). Provided guidance and troubleshooting for Graph API and PowerShell Graph Module, and implemented identity platform authentication code integration, proficient in OAuth2.0, OIDC, and SAML protocols.

Diagnosed root causes by collecting necessary diagnostic information and analyzing symptoms based on user inquiries. Provided tailored solutions to meet practical customer needs and ensure stable system operation.

Achieved timely localization and efficient resolution of Entra ID authentication business issues. Ensured platform stability and enhanced customer satisfaction through accurate diagnosis and dedicated support.

zh.title: 中科闻歌天湖部门
desc: 在新闻自动评论项目中，旨在提升用户活跃度和优化舆情管理，选择自动生成带情感色彩的新闻评论作为实习课题。构建了一个基于预训练模型的新闻评论生成系统，实现对娱乐体育新闻评论的自动生成，要求评论自然且具有情感极性。
利用腾讯快报新闻及评论数据构建训练集，并使用paddlehub的senta-bow模型对新闻文本完成情感标注；基于huggingface的Mengzi-T5模型进行微调，使用约16万条数据训练模型；反复调优生成策略，确保评论的连贯性和情感表达的准确性。
成功搭建出具有良好情感识别能力的新闻自动评论生成模型，在娱乐体育新闻场景下实现自然流畅的评论输出。模型在线API: https://huggingface.co/wawaup/MengziT5-Comment

en.title: Wenge Tech (Tianhu Dept)
desc: In the Automated News Commenting project, aimed at boosting user engagement and optimizing public opinion management, developed an automated news comment generation system as an internship topic. Built a system based on pre-trained models to generate natural comments with emotional polarity for entertainment and sports news.

Constructed training sets using Tencent Kuai-bao news/comment data, and performed sentiment labeling using PaddleHub's senta-bow model. Fine-tuned the Mengzi-T5 model from Hugging Face using approximately 160,000 data entries; iteratively optimized generation strategies to ensure coherence and emotional accuracy.

Successfully built an automated news comment generation model with strong sentiment recognition capabilities, achieving natural and fluent output in entertainment and sports scenarios. Online API: https://huggingface.co/wawaup/MengziT5-Comment

zh.title: 实时数据可视化平台
desc: 实现了能处理游乐场用户移动实时数据、分析历史数据的可视化平台，先使用python实现数据的清洗预处理，并进行趋势预测。基于HTML、CSS、JavaScript、Bootstrap实现前端，node.js、express完成后端接口，使用postgre16作为数据库。搭建起包括实时数据仪表盘、动态图表、工作日志同步、历史数据分析展示与预测的数据可视化平台。

en.title: Real-time Data Visualization Platform
desc: Implemented a visualization platform capable of processing real-time amusement park user movement data and analyzing historical data. Used Python for data cleaning and trend forecasting. Developed the frontend with HTML/CSS/JS/Bootstrap and backend APIs with Node.js/Express, using PostgreSQL 16 as the database. Built a comprehensive platform featuring real-time dashboards, dynamic charts, work log synchronization, and historical data analysis.

zh.title: 智能语音交互系统
desc: 与小组成员共同完成基于树莓派的语音交互系统，包括语音识别、语音合成、问答、自然语言对话功能。我负责的部分是基于Tacotron2模型将问答及对话中模型的回复转为语音输出，对待合成文本进行分词、韵律标注等预处理工作，并对模型进行参数微调，优化合成速度。最后在树莓派系统上将语音识别、问答系统、语音合成的模型进行串接联调。

en.title: Intelligent Voice Interaction System
desc: Collaborated on a Raspberry Pi-based voice interaction system featuring ASR, TTS, Q&A, and NLP dialogue. Responsible for converting model responses into speech using the Tacotron2 model. Performed preprocessing tasks such as word segmentation and prosody labeling, and fine-tuned model parameters to optimize synthesis speed. Conducted joint debugging and integration of ASR, Q&A, and TTS models on the Raspberry Pi system.

zh.title: 地理知识图谱查询平台
desc: 设计基于neo4j图数据库的地理知识查询平台，包括相关知识节点查询、动态地图与坐标展示等功能。使用爬虫获得知识文本，前端实现使用Vue框架，样式组件实现使用ElementUI；结点渲染与图数据库连接基于github开源库neovis.js；动态地图功能实现使用百度地图API。

en.title: Geographic Knowledge Graph Query Platform
desc: Designed a geographic knowledge query platform based on Neo4j graph database, featuring node queries, dynamic maps, and coordinate displays. Used web crawlers to gather knowledge text. Developed the frontend with Vue and ElementUI; implemented node rendering and database connection using neovis.js; integrated dynamic map functionality via Baidu Maps API.

zh.title: 知识工程实践
desc: 基于neo4j图数据库与angular、Flask框架完成前后端，搭建了一个本地的图书榜单知识图谱，具有查看结点分类，搜索结点与关系，查看已读图书书库等功能；课程实践阶段二基于实验指导给出的资料与开源项目，完成了基于红军长征数据集的知识问答系统。

en.title: Knowledge Engineering Practice
desc: Developed frontend and backend using Neo4j, Angular, and Flask to build a local book ranking knowledge graph. Features include node classification, searching nodes/relationships, and managing a 'read books' library. In phase two, completed a Q&A system based on the Red Army Long March dataset using experimental guides and open-source projects.

zh.title: 天津大学校友之家小程序
desc: 本项目中作为PM完成校友之家小程序与后台从需求分析到落地上线的全过程，包括与甲方与三方的需求合作沟通。TJU校友之家是为校友会设计的集预约会议室、购买茶饮周边、校友留言、咨询公告功能于一体的多功能小程序，用户分为在校学生、教职工、校友；同时有对应的管理后台，后台可管理留言、会议室预约时段与记录、咨询发布以及用户反馈。茶饮周边的下单交易系统接入第三方有赞平台，小程序上线后至今用户达5k+，较好的维系了校友与母校之间的联系，为校友回母校提供便利。

en.title: TJU Alumni Home Mini-Program
desc: As PM, managed the entire lifecycle from requirements analysis to launch for the alumni mini-program and management backend. Coordinated with clients and third parties. The program features room booking, merchandise shopping, guestbooks, and news announcements for students, faculty, and alumni. Managed guestbooks, bookings, and user feedback via the backend. Integrated Youzan for transactions. Achieved 5k+ users, successfully strengthening the bond between alumni and the university.

zh.title: 微北洋4.0
desc: 本项目中作为PM完成微北洋4.0从需求分析到落地上线的全过程，包括后期的运营。微北洋是一款集课表、GPA、自习室查询、校园论坛、校务专区于一体的天大校园功能性APP。本人在项目中负责微北洋论坛功能的新增迭代以及app整体功能与UI的翻新。新版微北洋除了论坛功能，还增加了自定义课表与考表，运营活动限定皮肤等，上线后最高单日PV 3w+、UV 1w+，校园论坛与校务专区功能深受用户喜爱。

en.title: WePeiyang 4.0
desc: As PM, managed the full lifecycle from requirements to launch and operations for WePeiyang 4.0, a campus functional app integrating schedules, GPA, study room queries, and forums. Responsible for forum iterations and overall UI/functionality overhaul. Introduced custom schedules, exam calendars, and event skins. Achieved 30k+ peak daily PV and 10k+ UV. The forum and campus affairs sections became highly popular among users.

zh.title: 天外天工作室2020纳新H5
desc: 为招揽工作室新一年的成员，我与八位优秀的开发和设计人员，基于“天大冒险新手村”的主题，以色彩明亮的像素游戏风为基调，设计了像素画风任务导向的交互H5，进入H5可选择角色按顺序进入不同的场景，与产品组、设计组、开发组的动漫化形象进行互动完成任务，在对话中了解各个组别的职能与工作室氛围，在最后选择最喜爱的组别形象可获得报名链接。

en.title: TWT Studio 2020 Recruitment H5
desc: To recruit new members, I collaborated with eight developers and designers to create an interactive H5 based on the 'TJU Adventure Novice Village' theme. Using a bright pixel-art style, the H5 allowed users to choose characters and navigate scenes to interact with animated avatars of Product, Design, and Dev teams. Users learned about team functions and studio culture through dialogue, eventually receiving recruitment links for their preferred teams.

zh.title: 天外天招募中心
desc: 本项目中作为PM完成天外天招募中心需求分析、原型设计、项目管理的全过程，招募中心作为供全校社团或组织可使用的招募与纳新管理应用，分为客户端和管理端，客户端包括招募浏览与报名功能；管理端可设置问卷、管理报名信息、填写面试记录、自动发送面试短信等等，能够为校内社团或组织举办活动及纳新提供极大便利，也便于用户统一报名方式。

en.title: TWT Recruitment Center
desc: As PM, handled the entire process of requirements analysis, prototyping, and project management for the Recruitment Center. This application, available to all campus organizations, includes a client side for browsing and applying, and a management side for creating questionnaires, managing applicant info, recording interviews, and automating SMS notifications. It streamlined the recruitment process for campus clubs and unified the application experience for students.
